mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_goodscategory c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode order by gdsNum desc

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_goodscategory c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode} or c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef}

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_goodscategory c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (gdsNum, userID, repCon) values(#{gdsNum}, #{userID}, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.gdsNum, r.userID, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, m.userName from tbl_reply r inner join tbl_member m on r.userID = m.userID where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_reply where repNum = #{repNum} and userID = #{userID}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (userID, gdsNum, cartStock) values (#{userID}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.userID, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.userID = #{userID}
